lead_paragraph: LANOIL--Dr. Jerry, of White Plains, NY, died peacefully on May 24 at the age of 73. Funeral services will be held at noon on Friday, May 27 at the Riverside Funeral Chapel, in Mt Vernon, N.Y. 1/3
